message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire it at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand that $10000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $13500. This is a fair price that still allows me to make a profit, and I think you'll find it's a great value for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand that $11000 is still a bit lower than I'm comfortable with, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $14000. This is my final offer, and I think it's a fair price that reflects the value of the product. If you're still not interested, I'll have to consider other options.

I'm really interested in the product, but I'm afraid I won't be able to go any higher than $12000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle at $12000.
